additionalFrames

Class Downloaded

  • java.lang.Object
    • additionalFrames.Downloaded

  • public class Downloaded
extends java.lang.Object
    /** This class shows the JFrame associated with the "Downloaded" files of the application. This class uses a simply JPanel with a BoxLayout layout, along the Y Axis. Every istance of a "file" (downloaded or uploaded it doesn't matter) is shown as a JPanel with "null" layout, and it's stored in a Map with String as unique Id of the file.
    Author:
    Stefano Belli, Francesco Cozzolino
